groups.name: binocular.gix
groups.description: Configuration for the gix (Rust Git implementation) indexer.

properties.name: binocular.gix.skip-merges
properties.description: Whether to skip merge commits during repository indexing. When enabled, merge commits are excluded from the indexed data.

properties.name: binocular.gix.use-mailmap
properties.description: Whether to use the .mailmap file for author/committer name and email normalization. When enabled, Git's mailmap feature is applied to unify contributor identities.
